metadata.key_specifications: Quad 2-input AND gate, 4.5 V to 5.5 V supply voltage, BiCMOS high speed, IOFF circuitry for partial power-down mode, ESD protection up to 2000 V HBM and 1000 V CDM, -40 °C to +85 °C temperature range
metadata.applications: The datasheet does not explicitly mention main applications, but as a quad 2-input AND gate, it can be used in various digital logic circuits and systems.

page_summaries.content:
1.  General description
The 74ABT08 is a quad 2-input AND gate. This device is fully specified for partial power down applications using IOFF. The IOFF circuitry disables the output, preventing the potentially damaging backflow current through the device when it is powered down.

2.  Features and benefits
• Supply voltage range from 4.5 V to 5.5 V
• BiCMOS high speed and output drive
• Direct interface with TTL levels
• IOFF circuitry provides partial Power-down mode operation
• Latch-up protection exceeds 500 mA per JESD78B class II level A
• ESD protection:
    • HBM: ANSI/ESDA/JEDEC JS-001 class 2 exceeds 2000 V
    • CDM: ANSI/ESDA/JEDEC JS-002 class C3 exceeds 1000 V
• Specified from -40 °C to +85 °C

4.  Functional diagram

5.  Pinning information
5.1.  Pinning

5.2.  Pin description
Table 2. Pin description
Symbol Pin Description
1A, 2A, 3A, 4A 1, 4, 9, 12 data input
1B, 2B, 3B, 4B 2, 5, 10, 13 data input
1Y, 2Y, 3Y, 4Y 3, 6, 8, 11 data output
GND 7 ground (0 V)
VCC 14 supply voltage

6.  Functional description
Table 3. Function table

7.  Limiting values
Table 4. Limiting values

TSSOP14: plastic thin shrink small outline package; 14 leads; body width 4.4 mm SOT402-1

Nexperia 74ABT08
Quad 2-input AND gate

1. General description
2. Features and benefits
3. Ordering information

Product Summary.content: The 74ABT08 is a quad 2-input AND gate. This device is fully specified for partial power down applications using IOFF. The IOFF circuitry disables the output, preventing the potentially damaging backflow current through the device when it is powered down.

Key features and benefits of the 74ABT08 include: Supply voltage range from 4.5 V to 5.5 V, BiCMOS high speed and output drive, direct interface with TTL levels, IOFF circuitry for partial Power-down mode operation, latch-up protection exceeding 500 mA per JESD78B class II level A, ESD protection (HBM: ANSI/ESDA/JEDEC JS-001 class 2 exceeds 2000 V, CDM: ANSI/ESDA/JEDEC JS-002 class C3 exceeds 1000 V), and operation specified from -40 °C to +85 °C.

The 74ABT08 is a quad 2-input AND gate with IOFF circuitry for partial power-down mode operation, preventing backflow current when powered down. It features a supply voltage range of 4.5 V to 5.5 V, BiCMOS high speed and output drive, TTL level interface, latch-up protection, and ESD protection.

Key specifications of the 74ABT08 quad 2-input AND gate include: IOFF circuitry for partial power-down mode, 4.5 V to 5.5 V supply voltage range, BiCMOS high speed and output drive, TTL level interface, latch-up protection exceeding 500 mA, HBM ESD protection exceeding 2000 V, CDM ESD protection exceeding 1000 V, and operation from -40 °C to +85 °C.
